db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: Using a Qt module requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 COMPONENTS Sql REQUIRED) target_link_libraries(mytarget PRIVATE Qt6::Sql)
db:section.db:para: See also the Build with CMake overview.
